title: NFL Trade Deadline Preview and Aaron Rodgers vs. the Undefeated Rams | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 330)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to spotlight the teams that need to make deals and the players most likely to be shopped with the trade deadline approaching (3:00). Then the guys workshop their takes of the week on "Take Shop," preview Aaron Rodgers vs. the Rams, and more (23:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
